00028 /* Const ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #define DISPLAY_WORD    1
00030 #define DISPLAY_PICTURE 1
00031 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00032 #include "ht32.h"
00033 #include "ht32_board.h"
00034 #include "picture.h"
00035 #include "ht32_board_config.h"
00036 
00037 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00038   * @{
00039   */
00040 
00041 /** @addtogroup EBI_Examples EBI
00042   * @{
00043   */
00044 
00045 /** @addtogroup LCD
00046   * @{
00047   */
00048 
00049 
00050 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00051 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00052   * @brief  Main program.
00053   * @retval None
00054   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00055 int main(void)
00056 {
00057   /* Initialize LCD related peripheral                                                                      */
00058   LCD_Init();
00059 
00060   /* LCD driver configuration                                                                               */
00061   LCD_Config();
00062 
00063   /* Set back color as black                                                                                */
00064   LCD_BackColorSet(Black);
00065 
00066   /* Set text color as yellow                                                                               */
00067   LCD_TextColorSet(Yellow);
00068 #if DISPLAY_WORD
00069   /* Display words on LCD                                                                                   */
00070   LCD_StringLineDisplay(Line3, "       Holtek       ");
00071   LCD_StringLineDisplay(Line4, "     HT32 Series    ");
00072   LCD_StringLineDisplay(Line5, "     LCD Example    ");
00073 #endif
00074 #if DISPLAY_PICTURE
00075   /* Show pictures on LCD                                                                                   */
00076   LCD_PicDraw((144), (100), 48, 100, HT32_Table);
00077 #endif
00078   while (1);
00079 }
00080 
00081 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00082 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00083   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00084   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00085   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00086   * @retval None
00087   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00088 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00089 {
00090   /*
00091      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00092      Debug message can be added here.
00093      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00094   */
00095 
00096   while (1)
00097   {
00098   }
00099 }
00100 #endif
